title: One of a Set of Jars for Seven Sacred Oils or Unguents
description:
One of seven blue-green faience ointment jars of semi cylindrical form, with separate cover.  Flat base, sides taper outward slightly to projecting rim, interior and exterior glazed; in single column down front of each jar inscription in purple blue glaze. Flat circular cover, with mortise; upright disk knob in center with purple-blue band extending on top of cover.
Condition: In general, good. Glaze somewhat deteriorated. Two chips at the rim.
section: Maintaining the Deceased in the Afterlife

museum_location.name: Funerary Gallery 3, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor
